getResults

public java.util.ArrayList<Product> getResults(java.lang.String keyword,
                                               int pageNum)
Get a list of product info result given the keyword and page number.

Parameters:
keyword - The keyword of the product
pageNum - The page number of the product searching result that need to be scraped.
Returns:
A list of product with the information of name, price and vendor.

getDocumentByKeyword

public org.jsoup.nodes.Document getDocumentByKeyword(java.lang.String keyword)
Return a document that is the result of searching by a keyword

Parameters:
keyword - The returned document is generated after searched by this keyword
Returns:
A Document containing all the information of this html page.

getDocumentByUrl

public org.jsoup.nodes.Document getDocumentByUrl(java.lang.String url)
Return a document that is the result of accessing the given url

Parameters:
url - The url of the target document
Returns:
A document containing all the information of the target html page.

getResultsNumber

public java.lang.String getResultsNumber(java.lang.String keyword)
Get the total number of result given a searching keyword

Parameters:
keyword - The keyword to be searched in order to get the result
Returns:
The number of results. will display as (500+) if greater than 500.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Display the number of results of a searching keyword, or a list of product result information of a searching keyword, depending on the number of input parameter.

Parameters:
args - Display the number of results of a searching keyword: args[0]: the keyword to be searched Display the number of product result information of a searching keyword: args[0]: the keyword to be searched args[1]: the page number of the results to be retrieved from website.
